price: Akasema (Iblisi): Mola wangu Mlezi! Nipe muhula mpaka siku watapofufuliwa.
arabic: قَالَ رَبِّ فَأَنظِرۡنِيٓ إِلَىٰ يَوۡمِ يُبۡعَثُونَ
footnotes: Iblisi akasema, hali naye kesha kuwa ni mwenye kumuasi Mwenyezi Mungu: Ewe Muumba wangu! Nipe muhula, nibakishe usinitwae mpaka Siku ya Kiyama, Siku watapo fufuliwa watu wakawa hai baada ya kufa kwao.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: qāla rabbi fa-anẓir'nī ilā yawmi yub'ʿathūna
